definition: a row/a line/to set in order/to arrange/to line up/to eliminate/to drain/to push open/platoon/raft/classifier for lines, rows etc
to leak (of water or gas)/to drip/to drain/to discharge/to leak out/to divulge (secrets)/to give vent (to anger, spite etc)/to disperse/to reduce

sentences.english: Being alone is much better than with a prick who studies excrement.
sentences.chinese: 单身总比和研究排泄物的笨蛋在一起好吧。

sentences.english: The excreta of humans and land animals contain soluble refractory organic matter.
sentences.chinese: 人和陆生动物排泄物含有可溶的难处理有机物质。

sentences.english: If the quality of food eaten is good, then the excreta is comparitively easier to tolerate.
sentences.chinese: 如果吃的是优质食物，那么排泄物就相对容易忍受。

sentences.english: In Japan, the value of your nightsoil varied according to wealth;
sentences.chinese: 在日本，你的排泄物的价值取决于你的财富。

sentences.english: You see, the process used to harvest the Kerria lacca excretion is a pretty simple one.
sentences.chinese: 你看，一般获得紫胶虫排泄物的程序是非常简单的。

sentences.english: Necessity is the mother of invention. Turning human excreta into food is quite nauseating.
sentences.chinese: 需求是发明之母，将人类排泄物变成食物令人作呕。

sentences.english: Animal and crop waste can be used to fertilize the pond and feed the fish.
sentences.chinese: 动物排泄物和庄稼废物可以肥沃池塘也可喂鱼。

sentences.english: Hippuric acid was the earliest aromatic compound found in ruminant urine.
sentences.chinese: 马尿酸是最早从家畜排泄物中发现的芳香族化合物。

sentences.english: Mucus flowing out of the eye and the nose, nose secreta brings blood along sometimes.
sentences.chinese: 从眼和鼻流出粘液，鼻排泄物有时带血。

sentences.english: Excreta must be contained in flood or swampy conditions.
sentences.chinese: 排泄物必须被冲到水或沼泽中。

sentences.english: Nitrogen turnover from grazing livestock excreta is the key process in the nitrogen cycle of pasture ecosystems.
sentences.chinese: 放牧家畜排泄物氮转化是草原生态系统氮循环的关键。

sentences.english: Shellac is derived from the excretions of the Kerria lacca insect, most commonly found in the forests of Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 虫胶来自紫胶虫的排泄物，最常见的在泰国的森林。

sentences.english: A negative correlation existed between the levels of cations in haemolymph and excreta.
sentences.chinese: 血淋巴中阳离子水平与排泄物的量呈负相关。

sentences.english: That means their excrement is rich in fibres and nutrients.
sentences.chinese: 也就是说它们的排泄物里富含各种纤维和营养物。

sentences.english: My main role was to analyse human excrement.
sentences.chinese: 我的主要任务是分析人体排泄物。

definition: feces and urine/excreta/human or animal waste
to drain (factory waste etc)/to excrete (urine, sweat etc)
to poo poo (kiddie or feminine term)/also pr. [bian3 bian3]
